description:
WUG begins preparing for their first national tour! With all their solo projects going well, the girls feel satisfied and excited. Meanwhile, a wave of disquiet passes through the group as Shiraki announces to I-1 club that a new unit will be formed. And the three middle school girls who admire WUG finally knock on Green Leaves` door...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sourire, même dans les coups durs
When the Going Gets Tough, Smile
キツい時ほど笑ってナンボ
